ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: I have never heard that it is not a paladin only weapon.  Aradune is the main GM of the game s character.  think he might have some influence and might just be
ygData.messageBody:
I have never heard that it is not a paladin only weapon. Aradune is the main GM of the game's
character. think he might have some influence and might just be able to change the stats just for
his sword so that he can show it off? Don't act like a smart ass when noone really knows for sure
what it is.

CAB wrote:

> From: CAB <Bash@...>
>
> Paladin only? really? Did you all know Aradune is a ranger? And it is
> known that this is NOT a paladin only weapon.
>
> Grailyn
>
